featured.text: Over the years, the fearless tribesmen have stood strong against slavery, and resisted the urging of the Kenyan and Tanzanian governments to adopt a more modern lifestyle.

definition.zh_def: 部落成員，通常指生活在部落社會中的人。
definition.en_def: A member of a tribe, often living in a tribal society.
definition.example: The tribesman shared stories of his ancestors around the fire.
